record.title: ADJOURNMENT FROM FRIDAY, APRIL 25, 2008, TO TUESDAY, APRIL 29, 2008
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT FROM FRIDAY, APRIL 25, 2008, TO TUESDAY, APRIL 29, 2008 -- (House of Representatives - April 24, 2008)

[Page: H2737]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns tomorrow, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Tuesday next for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the gentleman from Maryland?
